begin BILL_FG_Larienna_Macrina
; adventuring behaveour for Larienna

; script location: should be placed on Larienna Macrina and used to augment
; her behaveour for joint adventuring with the Player during quest FG_Nchurdamz

;fixed in various ways 03/20

short healCompanion			; gets set in dialogue topic 'require aid'
short healCount				;makes you not get healed over and over
short questOver				; gets set in script 'BILL_FG_Hrelvesuu' when the beast dies
short noLore

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( GetHealth <= 0 )
	return
endif

if ( healCompanion == 1 )
	Cast "heal companion" Player
	set healCount to ( healCount + 1 )
	set healCompanion to 0
endif

if ( OnDeath == 1 )
	; when we are killed...
	if ( GetJournalIndex "FG_Nchurdamz" > 0 )
		; ... and if the player is on the quest to protect us...
		Journal "FG_Nchurdamz" 60		; blew it
	endif
endif

if ( questOver == 1 )
	Say "Vo\Misc\bill_lariennaend.wav", "Larienna: 'Hrelvesuu is vanquished, yet somehow I feel uneasy. I must investigate these ruins further. You have been a worthy companion. Farewell my friend.'"
 	AIWander 0 0 0 20 20 10 10 0 0 0 40 0
	set questOver to 0
endif


end BILL_FG_Larienna_Macrina
